data.name: MOTiON by RADiCAL
data.detailed_description:
RADiCAL democratizes 3D animation for independent content creators.

MOTiON by RADiCAL delivers AI-powered motion capture software that turns 2D videos into full 3D animation, with 6 degrees of freedom, and FBX output.

*Create. Share. Explore.*

No hardware, no suits, no effort: with our mobile app, you can turn regular 2D videos into professional 3D animations.

*Join a growing community to experience the future of 3D animation. Explore content created by our community in the explore channel in the app and on our website.

This first release of our desktop app features our proprietary 3D visualizer that allows you to preview animations created by our AI from videos recorded and uploaded through our mobile apps.

The app also allows you to access thousands of animations created by the RADiCAL community.

Choose your favorite character model to bring your animation to life, ranging in style from photo-realistic, anime / manga, sci-fi, cartoons, and many others.

FBX MOTION CAPTURE DOWNLOADS:

Professional motion capture files (*.fbx) are available through the app and also on our website, both for your own results and anything you find in our community channel.


WHAT'S NEXT?

This is just the beginning. Stay tuned for updates allowing more editing, import and export features right from your computer and many more exciting features as we expand our platform.

data.short_description: RADiCAL democratizes 3D animation for independent content creators.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 from 2014+ or comparable AMD CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000+ onboard or comparable from Nvidia/ AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: onboard sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 from 2015+ or comparable AMD CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 970+ or comparable AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: onboard sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
